game name: 
Colorfull sounds
 major goals: optimism, self-esteem, problem-solving,happiness 
 secondary goals: to improve Auditory memory
happiness is the ability for being satisfactory in personal and social life, and also sharing energetic emotions to others.
Optimism is the ability to think and behave positive even in difficult situations.
Problem solving is the ability to declare problems exactly and then find the possible and effective answers to solve them.
Self-esteem refers to regard yourself and self acceptance.

hello 
 Thanks for choosing Us!
 to use this application, at first must register your children 
just go to "register child" via parent application and then choose a username and password for your children 
 then log in with associated data here as your child
 you can use both applications capabilities when connecting to Wi-Fi.
 to active a game on your child device should choose "send game request" from the menu
 the results of your child is available in "Result" section .
